title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 36.1 - Form of statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 36.1 - Form of statement

State Regulations

The debt statement form to be used in connection with
public sales of bonds by school districts outside of cities shall be in the
form shown at Appendix 9 attached hereto and made a part hereof as fully as if
herein set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
36.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
